P

path(PawnController) - Static method in class engine.Rules
this method translate the exploredTab of findAPath into a list containing the path to follow.
pathOrNot(PawnController) - Static method in class engine.Rules
Interprets the Hashtable given by findAPath into a boolean result depending if there is a path from the controller's position to its objective by checking the presence of goalMark or noPathMark.
pawn - Variable in class world.Cell
true if there is a pawn, false otherwise.
Pawn - Class in items
represents a pawn that may be controller later by a controller.

pawnArray - Variable in class engine.Game
 
PawnController - Class in controller

placeWall(Coord, Coord) - Method in class controller.PawnController
given an coordinate (origin) and a direction (UP or RIGHT), place a wall and register it in the board.
